A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Different\, good but different. Director Rian Johnson takes the Star Wars Saga in a direction we weren't quite expecting. Adding to the mythos of the Force and of course Star Wars. It's funny\, as while this is NOT as similar to Empire as The Force Awakens was to a New Hope. It is getting the same reaction as Empire. Splitting options. 

To go from TFA to this\, wow. One film was a safe return to the Galaxy of far\, far away. While this takes risks in going in a new direction. Theories have been disproven. As Skywalker said in the trailer: "This isn't going to go\, the way you think". 

A well made film\, with great performances especially from Mark\, Daisy\, Adam and the late Carrie Fisher. With some beautiful imagery. 

Given it's similar reaction (like Empire) in time this film will be seen as one of the best from the Saga.
